name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @elainejgodfrey: Wouldn't court packing just mean an endless zig zag pattern of adding new justices every time a new party is in power? Wouldn't it ... eventually degrade the Court's legitimacy? 

I asked @TakeBacktheCt's @AaronBelkin these questions. Here's what he said:

https://t.co/d2zZ1LhAFo

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @JeffreyGoldberg: "Most likely, your future is also brighter than what you may think at your darkest moments, so dispute your pessimism not with mindless optimism, but with facts."

As usual, great advice from @arthurbrooks (via @TheAtlantic):
https://t.co/H7x3ItXxbE

name: TheAtlantic
text: For years, the Gates Foundation has documented gradual progress in public health—fewer children dying, less malnutrition, longer life spans. But COVID-19 has set back the world dramatically, @BillGates said in an interview with @edyong209: https://t.co/BI98UqOh64
